title: Dr Zakir Naik invited by State Government of Terengganu, Malaysia, in June 2023 (4 Min)
transcript: it is an honor and a pleasure for me to be invited by the chief minister of taranganu State [Music] [Music] it is an honor and a pleasure for me to be invited by the chief minister of taranganu State foreign [Music] [Applause] [Music] [Music] foreign foreign [Applause] to do certain duties of Islam in the country whether I disagree with you according to me amongst all the them I say Malaysia is the best Democratic Muslim country in the world [Applause] [Music] foreign [Music]
